meanings: (정신·기운 등을) (의식을 되찾다) regain[recover] consciousness, (분별력을 찾다) come to (one's senses), get back to one's senses...
실용회화- 식사중에 Don't stand on ceremony.
실용회화-방문 Don't hesitate to eat more.

vlive.korean: 너 맞아야 정신 차리지? You have to be hit to get it together, right? 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [남자사람친구 14일전]_4화 | 못생긴 애가 예쁘게도 자네
vlive.english: You have to be hit to get it together, right?

vlive.korean: [디X터 한번 피자보이 되어봐야 정신을 차리지?] 이렇게 말하니까 안 무섭지, 진짜 무서웠는데. It doesn't sound scary saying it like this. It was really scary. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Red Velvet] 예리포터와 디X터의 악몽👻(Yeri talking about her L.A. review)
vlive.english: It doesn't sound scary saying it like this. It was really scary.

vlive.korean: 니가 정신을 차리지! for your mind to be cleared! 듣기 View video 홍익슈퍼 (HONG IK SUPER) : [홍익슈퍼]EP03_ 하찮은 초능력자로 산다는 것은
vlive.english: for your mind to be cleared!

vlive.korean: 감자 튀김으로 맞아봐야 정신 차리지? Do I need to beat you with french fries to get to senses? 듣기 View video HAPPYFACE : Dalshabet On Air 지면광고 촬영장에서!
vlive.english: Do I need to beat you with french fries to get to senses?

vlive.korean: 저는 커피를 굉장히 좋아해서. 커피샾을 차리지 않았을까 해요. I really like coffee. I would have opened a coffee shop. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A.De - 에이디이 '정신차리쇼!!'
vlive.english: I really like coffee. I would have opened a coffee shop.

examples.korean: Staff respond well to her unbuttoned style of management. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 직원들은 그녀의 격식을 차리지 않는 관리 스타일에 대해 반응이 좋다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Staff respond well to her unbuttoned style of management. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: an informal arrangement / meeting / visit 듣기 Add to Wordbook 격식을 차리지 않는 협의/모임/방문 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an informal arrangement / meeting / visit Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Please don’t stand on ceremony with me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저한테는 너무 격식 차리지 마세요[마음 편하게 가지세요]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please don’t stand on ceremony with me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The prince’s manner was informal, without a trace of pomposity. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 왕자의 태도는 격식을 차리지 않고 거만한 구석이라고는 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The prince’s manner was informal, without a trace of pomposity. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don't be so formal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그렇게 격식 차리지 마세요. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Don't be so formal. Add to Wordbook
